## IProofService interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IProofService 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [generateAuthV2Inputs(hash, did, profileNonce, circuitId)](./polygonid-js-sdk.iproofservice.generateauthv2inputs.md) | generates auth inputs |
|  [generateProof(proofReq, identifier, credential, opts)](./polygonid-js-sdk.iproofservice.generateproof.md) | Generate proof from given identity and credential for protocol proof request |
|  [transitState(did, oldTreeState, isOldStateGenesis, stateStorage, ethSigner)](./polygonid-js-sdk.iproofservice.transitstate.md) | <p>transitState is done always to the latest state</p><p>Generates a state transition proof and publishes state to the blockchain</p> |
|  [verifyProof(zkp, circuitName)](./polygonid-js-sdk.iproofservice.verifyproof.md) | Verification of zkp proof for given circuit id |
